item.title: List Modified Files by Filtering Keyword in git Commit Messages
item.description: I was pretty suprised that when I was looking for a git command that can list out all the modified files in git commits that contain certain string. Then I found that there's no such a command out of the box. So I start searching for different commands and put those pieces together.

item.title: Utilize git-worktree When Handling Urgent Ticket
item.description: Have you ever been in a situation that, you're halfway to complete a feature and interrupted by an urgent ticket? You've modified tons of files and you need to put the modified files somewhere so that you can start working on the urgent ticket.
